name: skimping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
skimp
to not spend enough time or money on something, or to not use enough of something in order to do a job or activity as it should be done: Many old people skimp on food and heating in order to meet their bills. When choosing a hotel, do not skimp.
